attributes.action: Instruct the prime minister in waiting (Gordon Brown) to comment on the actions he would take realting to latest Iran crisis.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Gordon Brown is to be the next Prime minister , it would be informative to know how he would handle the lastest crisis with Iran. As is his he way , He seems to be remarkable absent anytime there is a crisis. How can we have faith in someone not prepared to step up to the plate?
